Gopal Sharma

University of Massachussets, Amherst

I am a Ph.D. student at CICS UMass-Amherst. I am advised by Prof. Evangelis Kalogerakis, and Prof. Subhransu Maji. I am interested in Deep Learning, Computer Vision and Deep Reinforcement Learning. Previously, I have worked at VCC with Prof. Bernard Ghanem. Currently, I am working on interpretable Generative Networks for Visual Program Induction.
